attributes.description: All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXSTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA N1 Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit you needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Kia Konfidence N1 TEAM NOW!

attributes.description: Excellent Condition Renault Duster Dynamic, One Owner from new with Full service history, Spare key and balance of factory warranty. BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now
